mapper.insert: insert into bucket values ( seq_buc_idx.nextval, #{bucBread}, #{bucMain}, #{bucVegi}, #{bucCheese}, #{bucSource}, #{bucTopping}, #{bucSide}, #{bucIsSalad}, #{bucIsOvened}, #{bucSet}, #{bucCost}, #{bucDiscntRate}, #{bucKcal}, #{bucQuantity}, default, #{bucCustomerIdx}, #{bucBranch}, #{bucCusoOrderNo} )
mapper.select: select b.buc_idx as bucIdx, b.buc_bread as bucBread, b.buc_main as bucMain, b.buc_vegi as bucVegi, b.buc_cheese as bucCheese, b.buc_source as bucSource, b.buc_topping as bucTopping, b.buc_side as bucSide, b.buc_is_salad as bucIsSalad, b.buc_is_ovened as bucIsOvened, b.buc_set as bucSet, b.buc_cost as bucCost, b.buc_discnt_rate as bucDiscntRate, b.buc_kcal as bucKcal, b.buc_quantity as bucQuantity, b.buc_reg_date as bucRegDate, b.buc_customer_idx as bucCustomerIdx, m.mgr_name as bucBranch from bucket b join manager m on b.buc_branch =m.mgr_no where b.buc_customer_idx = #{bucCustomerIdx} and b.buc_cuso_order_no = 0

select ingre_idx as ingreIdx, ingre_label as ingreLabel, ingre_type as ingreType, ingre_cost15 as ingreCost15, ingre_cost30 as ingreCost30, ingre_discnt_rate as ingreDiscntRate, ingre_kcal as ingreKcal, ingre_active as ingreActive, ingre_description as ingreDescription, ingre_filepath as ingreFilepath,ingre_reg_date as ingreRegDate, ingre_recom_sauce as ingreRecomSauce from ingredients
select buc_idx from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select * from bucket order by buc_idx desc) b) where rnum = 1
select mgr_no as mgrNo, mgr_name as mgrName from manager where mgr_no = #{mrgNo}
mapper.update: update bucket set buc_quantity = #{val} where buc_idx = #{bucIdx}
mapper.select: select distinct b.buc_bread as bucBread, b.buc_main as bucMain, b.buc_vegi as bucVegi, b.buc_cheese as bucCheese, b.buc_source as bucSource, b.buc_topping as bucTopping, b.buc_side as bucSide, b.buc_is_salad as bucIsSalad, b.buc_is_ovened as bucIsOvened, b.buc_set as bucSet, b.buc_cost as bucCost, b.buc_discnt_rate as bucDiscntRate, b.buc_kcal as bucKcal, b.buc_quantity as bucQuantity from bucket b join myMenu m on m.mm_buc_idx = b.buc_idx where m.mm_buc_idx = #{mmBucIdx}
